title: Crashing Every Single Game
body: Recently Ive been crashing in all games. I only crash when im about to leave the fountain or when i do leave the fountain. I tried repairing league and even uninstalling but it still did not work. Anyone can help me with this problem?

replies.body: Can you go into a bit more detail on the crash? Do you see a specific error message such as Network error or Bugsplat? Additionally, do you happen to be running Windows 10? With a bit more info, I can provide more accurate steps to resolve this.

Same thing has happened to me and quite a number of other people. Download the Hextech Repair tool and use it to create logs of your client. Then send a support ticket with the logs attached (they'll be called "LoL Logs.zip"), the more tickets we send for this issue the faster it gets resolved.
